"DateTime" attribute
The "Date and Time" type of attribute records corresponding values (date and time) in one field.
In order to select a value, click on the
icon. The System will display a calendar to select the date and time. The values are selected using the buttons:
"Today" – shows the current date and random time (before the current moment);
"Now" – shows the current date and current time;
Select a date and/or time manually in the calendar. Then click the "Done" button.
The date and/or time can be entered manually without using
.
Attributes types such as "Date" and "Date and Time" have
additional visual settings
:
Start selection from year range
. If "Yes" is selected, the calendar will be displayed in reverse order: years range → year → months → days.
Possible to specify future date
. Defining the possibility of selecting a date after the actual date. Possible values: yes/no. In case of selecting a "No" value and entering the date after the actual date, data will be erased automatically. The unavailable to enter value will not be recorded.
The visuals can be configured to display data.
The "Date and Time" attribute, entered to the
registry
has a
filtering option
. For the correct display of filtered values, the System analyses local server settings/time zone.
